title: Lass
description: Addison Walker is every fantasy I never dared to believe in.Moving to this town was already monumental.Finding her removes any lingering doubt.She’s bold and vibrant.Beautiful and confident.Far too good for the likes of me.Luckily, I’m not good at avoiding temptation. My desire is growing beyond control.I’m done watching on the sidelines.When opportunity strikes, I eagerly take advantage.Signing on the dotted line before thinking twice. The repercussions cross my mind far too late.When she swiftly sticks me in the friend-zone, there’s not a damn thing I can do about it.Addison is just down the hall—might as well be miles away.Temptation drives me to the edge of sanity. She speaks to my deepest cravings like a siren.Our chemistry blurs every line. This battle seems impossible to win.Yet my determination doesn’t wane.It only takes one night to change everything.After all, I didn’t wait all this time to settle for less.
author: Harloe Rae
